content.text: According to the question, what are the three numbers ?

solution.text:
Let's assume x-1,x,x+1 be three consecutive integers.
Sum of three consecutive integers is _{{3*j}}_.
(x-1) + x + (x+1) = _{{3*j}}_
3x = _{{3*j}}_
x = _{j}_
Therefore three consecutive numbers are _{{j-1}}_, _{{j}}_, _{{j+1}}_
